heading.title: Order No. {{orderId}}
heading.body: We've already emailed and texted you these order details. Though, you may want to take note of your order number to access this page in the future.

shipment.cancelCTAText: Are you sure you want to cancel this item?
shipment.cancelCTAText_plural: Are you sure you want to cancel these items?
shipment.cancelledText: We've cancelled this item. We'll process your refund back to your original payment method.
shipment.cancelledText_plural: We've cancelled these items. We'll process your refund back to your original payment method.
shipment.finalCancelError: Sorry, there was still a problem with cancelling.
shipment.cancelContactUs: Contact us to cancel your order
shipment.extendedAlert: We'll keep your items in-store for another 7 days until {{extendedUntil}} at {{location}}.
shipment.extendedAlertError: Sorry, we had a problem extending your collection.
shipment.finalExtendedAlertError: Sorry, there was still a problem with extending your collection.
shipment.extendContactUs: Contact us to extend your collection

order.cancelCTAText: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
order.cancelledText: We've cancelled this order. We'll process your refund back to your original payment method.
